title: Workshops
text:
Workshop for fostering a culture of scientific research in the institutions where officers of Sri Lanka Scientific Service are serving - Practical training on Statistics for Research - Organized by Ministry of Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government (Nov 2023).
Pre-Congress workshop on Basic statistical methods in health research, organized by the College of Medical Administrators of Sri Lanka (Aug 2023).
Essentials of Data Science - online workshop series organized by the Center for Data Science (2023 Jan - 2023 June)
A workshop on Using LMS for effective assessment (formative and summative), Academic Staff Training on E-learning Aspects 2022 – Organized by the Staff Training subcommittee of the Faculty of Science, University of Colombo (June 2022).
Virtual Series of Short Courses in Statistical Methods for Biologists - Forecasting Methods, conducted by Institute of Biology, Sri Lanka (June 2022).
Workshop on R for Data Science - A Crash Course - A pre-conference workshop of the International Conference on Multidisciplinary Approaches in Science (ICMAS2021) organized by the Center for Data Science (November 2021).
Workshop on How to use R Programming for Research - Organized by the Center for Data Science in collaboration with Research Committee, Faculty of Science, University of Colombo (July 2021).
Workshop on Basics of R Programming for Research - Organized by the Center for Data Science in collaboration with Research Committee, Faculty of Science, University of Colombo (July 2021).
Workshop on Importance of Statistics for Research - Organized by the Center for Data Science in collaboration with Research Committee, Faculty of Science, University of Colombo (July 2021).
A session on Importance of Statistics in Research & How to Get Help in the workshop titled Effective Proposal Writing and Thereafter - Organized by the Center for Data Science in collaboration with Research Committee, Faculty of Science, University of Colombo (May 2021).
Training Program on Multivariate Data Analysis Using SPSS and Introduction to R Statistical Software (Jan 2019).
Introduction to R and Basic Data Analysis - Staff Development Center, University of Colombo (July 2018).
Statistical inference using R - Practical session, Center for Banking Studies, Central Bank of Sri Lanka (July 2018).
Training Workshop on R - Department of Statistics & Computer Science and Research Service Centre, Faculty of Science, University of Kelaniya (December 2017).
One - Day Workshop on Biological Modeling, Research & Academic Collaboration Program, University of Kelaniya (November 2016).

title: About Me
text:
I am a senior lecturer at the Department of Statistics, University of Colombo, Sri Lanka. I am a passionate researcher.



Computational Statistics
Genomic Biostatistics
Biological Data Modeling
Machine Learning
Big Data Analytics
R Programming





PhD in Genomic Biostatistics, Old Dominion University, VA, USA
MS in Statistics, University of Texas at El Paso, TX, USA
BSc in Statistics (First Class Honours), University of Colombo, Sri Lanka

title: About Me
text:
Experience
I have more than 15 years of experience in research, consultancy and teaching. I like to model data and communicate to public in efficent ways.

title: Software
text:
Software Released

RNASSA 2.0: RNA Secondary Structure Analysis (Version 2.0.121208). Leung, M.-Y., Mohl, J., Licon, A., Viswakula, S., Kelley, P., Araiza, R., Kodimala, V., Vegesna, R., Saldivar, L., Yehadego, D., Cardenas, G., Vest, E.,Fuentes, O., Taufer, M., Johnson, K. L., (2012).
